description: Ancient Polynesians explored the entire Pacific on great voyaging canoes built with traditional yet sophisticated techniques. A nod to native exploration and craftsmanship, the rich, premium full-grain leather Mea Ola features canoe lash whipstitching and octopus- inspired laser-etched artwork – a super comfortable sandal with design inspired by age-old tradition.
name: Olukai Mea Ola - Mens

specs.value: Rich, premium full-grain leather straps, soft microﬁber lining and a comfortable handsewn toe post
Compression molded EVA midsole wrapped in full-grain leather provides anatomically correct contour for a personalized ﬁt and sustained comfort over time
Full-grain leather wrapped outsole with non-marking rubber traction pods for enhanced grip and ﬂexibility
Comfortable hand-sewn leather toe post, octopus-inspired laser- etched artwork on the footbed, canoe lash whipstitching, and embroidered logo. Leather Working Group certiﬁed supplier
